body:
> To build the CLI tool locally, clone the Temporal server repo and run make bins.

How to install in tctl in windows? How can I compile with `make` for Windows? Is there a Windows binary? (I don't want to use docker at the moment.)

comments.body:
`make tctl` is simple:
```
go build -o tctl cmd/tools/cli/main.go
```
This should work on Windows.

Updated instructions to build tctl for Win:
1. Install Go. You may need to update WSL.
2. Clone https://github.com/temporalio/tctl
3. `go build -o tctl.exe <local repo path>\cmd\tctl\main.go`

Long term, a Win dist for tctl would be really appreciated. Instructions for building it locally will inevitably become out of date. And using tctl through Docker can be pretty involved when you need to install certs etc.

title: No way to install in tctl binaries in windows?
